lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Oct. 2 (AP) -- American B-24 Liberator bombers and their P-40 escorts carried out two attacks against Japanese shipping Thursday, damaging a 100-foot gunboat near Fort Bayard, Indo-China, and bombing a 100-foot freighter in the South China Sea.
abstract: US planes raid Jap shipping near Ft Bayard; hit gunboat; Chinese rept Jap drive from Fu River area, Kiangsi, halted by Chinese counter-attacks; heavy fighting still in progress; Jap troop launches attempting attack on Chinese positions near Nanyang beaten off; Chinese forces attacking strategic points southeast of Sheklung inflict casualties, take prisoners, before routing foe
